name: Spartacus Neon Edition
description:
Spartacus Neon Edition is a short autochess game with a retro-arcade ambiance and shapes fighting to death.

                                             

Features :

  • Buy up to 3 different troop classes to make an army.
  • Re-organise your troops to make your army more efficient.
  • Upgrade your troops to make them deadlier.
  • Fight 20 waves of ennemies that get deadlier as you play.

                                             

This game was made by 2 students from e-artsup Paris in their 2nd Year of Creative Coding as a part of a school project.

Note : This game was made without any artists.

CREATIVE CODING :

Kyllian BONNIER (Programming, UI, AI...)

Alban LOZAC'H (Programming, UI, AI...)
